ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that it is He Who enriches and Who satisfies;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That it is He who makes you rich and contented;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that He it is Who bestowed wealth and riches,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is He who grants people temporary and durable wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And that it is He Who has given wealth and contentment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that it is He Who Aghna and Aqna.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that He it is Who enriches and gives to hold;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and that it is He who gives wealth and riches,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that He it is Who enricheth and contenteth;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: that it is He who gives wealth and possessions;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And that it is He Who enricheth and preserveth property.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: that it is He who enriches and grants possessions,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That it is He Who giveth wealth and satisfaction;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that it is He (Allah) Who gives much or a little (or gives wealth and contentment),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that it is He who gives riches and causes to hoard,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And that it is He who enriches and impoverishes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And that it is He who enriches and suffices
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:48] and that it is He Who enriches, people by [granting them] sufficient wealth, and grants possessions, [He Who] gives that wealth that is enjoyed as property,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that He it is Who enricheth) He made Himself independent of the need for created beings (and contenteth) and He made His slaves needy for Him; it is also said that this means: He made some rich with gold and silver and others content with the possession of camels, bovines and sheep.
